item.title: Interview with Dr Vukosi Marivate
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: We had the opportunity to catch up with data enthusiast Dr Vukosi Marivate in Cape Town whilst he was presenting at the Computational Social Science Workshop at UCT. We were able to find out more about his role that bridges data, policy, Africa and the people, check it out below, and remember, always be learning (ABL). What do you think about having more scientists in policy? For many reasons itâ€™s good.
